text: Roberta Gentini (born 8 August 1973) is an Italian equestrian. She competed in the individual eventing at the 1996 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Italy Category:Equestrians at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:People from Novara
title: Roberta Gentini
